about.title: Hello!
about.description: My name is Matheus Barreto. I am an IT technician graduated from FAETEC-RJ and a Software Engineering student at Universidade Estácio de Sá. I am a Full-stack developer using Springboot, React, and MySQL, and I work as a Front-end developer on personal projects and with some clients.

knowledge.title: I have knowledge in:
skills: Knowledge in AWS with Cloud Practitioner certification
Knowledge in Gitlab CI and Github Workflow
Basic knowledge in automated front-end testing with Playwright

my_experiences.title: Folha Vitória - ES
my_experiences.description: I am responsible for maintaining and creating pages in Wordpress without using third-party tools.

my_experiences.description: I am responsible for infrastructure support, keeping workstations, servers, and the rest of the infrastructure available.

my_projects.title: IBEF-ES - ES
my_projects.description: I developed the current and previous layout.

my_projects.title: Forum Hub - Oracle Next One Program
my_projects.description: I developed the backend system using Java with Springboot for a forum, including API documentation via Swagger.

my_projects.title: Simple Desk - Personal Project
my_projects.description: I co-created a complete software for technicians to manage support tickets and company equipment, developing the Front-end and assisting in data modeling and system processes.

my_projects.title: Pass.in - Participant Management for Events
my_projects.description: I developed the backend of an application for managing participants in in-person events during NLW Unite.

my_projects.title: Network Tester
my_projects.description: I developed this Python script to perform continuous testing on wired and wireless networks.

my_projects.title: DigitalBooking - CTD Final Project
my_projects.description: I co-developed a room booking software similar to Air BnB. I was part of the front-end and infrastructure teams.
